title: "Civilians Targeted": Kabul After Pakistan Says 70 Killed In Afghan Border Attack
summary_full: Pakistan's military has claimed that it has killed at least 70 in strikes along the border with Afghanistan over the weekend, targeting what it described as terror hideouts, which it blamed for recent attacks inside the country.
